events.start: osascript -e 'display notification "Meme Magic Started on Port 3001" with title "MemeMagic"'
events.restart: osascript -e 'display notification "Meme Magic Re-Started on Port 3001" with title "MemeMagic"'
events.crash: osascript -e 'display notification "Meme Magic Has CRASHED." with title "MemeMagic"'
events.exit: osascript -e 'display notification "Exited Meme Magic" with title "MemeMagic"'
